description:
Blake Lively stars in the upcoming movie It Ends With Us alongside Justin Baldoni. While the two play characters that are intended to have a great chemistry in the film, it turns out that events behind-the-scenes were quite different. In fact, Blake Lively reportedly felt “fat-shamed” by her co-star. The alleged “fat-shaming” occurred when the [...]

title: Blake Lively Reportedly Felt “Fat-Shamed” By ‘It Ends With Us’ Co-Star Justin Baldoni

description:
Actor Nicolas Cage has taken on some very surprising and impressive roles over the years. title: Nicolas Cage Will Play John Madden In New Biopic

description:
Disney Plus is one of the most popular streaming services currently available. However, for one subscriber, the terms of the service may prevent him from filing a very serious lawsuit. The man named Jeffrey Piccolo, who once subscribed to Disney Plus, is suing the Walt Disney Company after his wife, Kanokporn Tangsuan, died from a [...]

title: Disney Wants Lawsuit Tossed Because Plaintiff Had Disney Plus Subscription Prior To His Wife’s Allergy Death

description:
Elliot Page has had a major career in Hollywood for decades. At only 37-years-old, trans actor Elliot Page is now telling Hollywood that they’ll act “if people want to cast a trans guy.” This message from Page comes just ahead of this month’s season of The Umbrella Academy, a Netflix series in which Page stars, [...]

title: Elliot Page Offers To Act “If People Want To Cast A Trans Guy”
